description:
Imbue an Ice Bullet with extra mana to make it break,
damaging and lowering AGI for all enemies for 3 turns.
name: Icy Shot X
note:
<Item 228 Cost: 1>
<Learn Cost: 25 JP>
<Custom Show Eval>
  if ($gameActors.actor(9).isClass($dataClasses[47])) {
    visible = true;
  } else {
    visible = false;
  }
</Custom Show Eval>
